name: DIY GEM ESSENCES
description: Just as you might choose to carry or wear a specific gemstone to help shift your energy, you can call on the gem and mineral kingdom via gemstone essences to assist you, too. Gemstone essences, especially when used regularly, can create profound shifts in your life. They can help to remove blockages and restore chi, bringing you into balance and alignment with your natural rhythms. Learn through this guide the (very simple) steps of creating your own gemstone essences, which take very little time and can so improve your quality of life.
